---
name: work_branch
description: identify the working branch for development tasks.
---

Branch "main" is the original main branch of upstream repo  https://github.com/HKUDS/nanobot.git.  It must keep track with the upstream repo.

Branch "main_embed" is the main branch for this repo with support for embedding devices.
Branch "main" is merged into branch "main_embed" regularly to keep it up to date with the upstream repo.
